pro aatsr_quicklook res = file_search('/mnt/Projects/MEREMSII/temp_data','*.N1') short = strmid(res,0,87) for ii=0,n_elements(res)-1 do begin ;if not file_test(res[ii]) then continue ;copy = where(short eq short[ii],cc) ;if cc gt 0 then for ll=1,n_elements(copy)-1 do if file_test(res[copy[ll]]) then file_delete,res[copy[ll]] tt = GET_AATSR_QUICKLOOK(res[ii],/RGB) endfor end
